original: 「這是傳國璽啊！李斯篆此八字於其上。應上篆文八字句。光武得此寶，傳位至今。聽聞十常侍作亂，回宮後卻找不到此物。」
text: "This is the Seal of the Kingdom! Li Sizhuan has this eight-character on it. It should be written on the eight-character sentence in the seal script. Guangwu obtained this treasure, and it has been passed down to the present. I heard that the Shichang servant was in chaos, but I couldn't find it after returning to the palace."
